msbt.message: The Bug-Off is about to start!Am I nervous? <10_4 />You bet I am! I'm shakin' like a leaf with a giant beetle on it!
The big Bug-Off is about to start, you know.Nothin' gets me more fired up than matchin' wits with a bug!
You gonna be a part of the big bug competition today, kiddo? You know you need a net, right? No net, no bugs. No bugs, no glory. No gloryno, uh, MEGA GLORY!
You buggin' out today, kiddo? That's my way of askin' if you're entered in the Bug-Off. You know the secret, right?<10_4 /> Bugs are real skittery, so you gotta walk up to 'em nice and slow
So, you're a fellow competitor in the Bug-Off today, right?I don't care much about the resultsas long as I get first place. Gahaha!
We're goin' all out for those bugs today, and I'm fired up!Better get your head in the game, kiddo, or ol' is gonna get 'em all!
In case you haven't heard, ol' did pretty well in the Bug-Off. Yep, the battle of versus bug has been decided.
Whew! Glad that bug tournament is all done with.I haven't swung my shoulder around that much since the shoulder swingin' tournament of aught-six!
I was in fine bug-catching form for that one, kiddo. My net skills were as good as they've ever been!
How's it goin'? Bugs flyin' right into your net or what?Man, the thrill of sneakin' up on a real rare bug and then nabbin' it? , it's the best
You seen me out there swingin' my net? There's plenty of life left in these wrists, kiddo. And now I'm about to dial it up to a hundred. Giddyup!
If the bugs are buggin' you durin' the Bug-Off, just bug out and bag 'em! What? I've got bugs on the brain!
You think the bugs like it when it's this hot out? 'Cause it's sure buggin' me! Gahaha! Let's see the bugs make a pun like that!
